name: I'm Sorry Sir, We're Out Of Control
name_original: I'm Sorry Sir, We're Out Of Control
description:
hope u guys like my game

not authorized, licensed, or endorsed by the makers of Control (2019) in any way

for some reason particles don't work in the browser version, if you want a slightly nicer user experience go ahead and download the executable version

controls:

click and drag to move (sort of)

r to restart

space to go to next dialogue
